recipe_def.notes: Local production path for base surface_treatment_station using the v0 assembly process.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

recipe_def.notes: Bootstrap production path for mare regolith using the simple mining process.

steps.notes: Extract ilmenite from regolith; yields generated in process.

recipe_def.assumptions: Extraction yields ~0.6 kg ilmenite per 1 kg regolith input; tailings ~0.4 kg.
recipe_def.notes: In-situ ilmenite extraction from regolith; placeholder yields and mass balance.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for ilmenite extraction from regolith

steps.notes: Single-step carbothermal reduction from ore to iron pig/ingot.

recipe_def.notes: Direct path from iron ore/ilmenite to iron_pig_or_ingot using the iron_smelting_reduction_v0 process.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for iron pig or ingot

recipe_def.assumptions: Pig iron to steel ingot via refining to billet/slab then casting to ingot.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for steel ingot v0

steps.notes: Heat steel ingot or billet to rolling temperature (1100-1250C)
Hot roll to plate or sheet thickness with multiple passes

recipe_def.assumptions: Steel plate/sheet production from steel ingots via hot rolling. Plate is >6mm thick, sheet is <6mm. Pickling or cold rolling can be added for improved surface finish and dimensional control. QA inspection omitted here to avoid circular dependency on finished_part.
recipe_def.notes: Steel plate and sheet stock for fabrication, structural components, and enclosures. Surface treatment not yet modeled explicitly.

recipe_def.assumptions: Cast structural members then weld into frame; machining/fixtures omitted.
recipe_def.notes: Could be refined into cut-and-weld plate instead of casting members.

steps.notes: Cast impeller blades and hub assembly
Machine impeller hub, bore, keyways; balance impeller assembly
Fabricate baffles, mounting brackets from sheet steel
Assemble impellers on shaft, attach baffles to mounting structure

recipe_def.assumptions: Impellers cast and machined for balance. Baffles fabricated from sheet metal.
recipe_def.notes: Basic agitation system with impellers and baffles for quench tank fluid circulation.

steps.notes: Machine pump internals, impeller bore, shaft, and bearing surfaces
Assemble motor, impeller, shaft, seals, and housing
Test pump flow rate, pressure, and check for leaks

recipe_def.assumptions: Centrifugal pump with small electric motor. For coolant circulation in thermal management systems.
recipe_def.notes: Coolant circulation pump for heat transport loops. Maintains coolant flow for heat rejection.
Version 1: Explicit target_item_id for indexer alignment; placeholder steps.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for chemical bath tank set v1

recipe_def.notes: Local production path for base surface_treatment_station using the v0 assembly process.
